turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order at my nearest Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would that be Starbucks at 1126 Central Park Dr, O'Fallon, Illinois?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a Caramel Brulee Latte with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great. Would that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the total will be 10 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your phone and your order will be waiting for you at Starbucks at 1126 Central Park Dr in O'Fallon Illinois.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's all. You know what, actually change the size to a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Your new total is 12 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is ready for pickup at Starbucks at 1126 Central Park Dr, O Fallon, Illinois.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.
